column4: Good evening.. I'm having a severe problem with the breezy upgrade.. can anyone help?
and now I've lost ability to startx completely
what is the error when it 'stops'
error processing [package name[
any more information than that
is there a way to cut and paste in the CLI?
I personally dont know of one
it says "trying to overwrite '/usr/share/libofx/dtd/open.dcl' which is also in package libofx0c102
my advice is to remove the libofx0c102 then do the upgrade and reinstall that package if needed
I will try
ok
I removed the entire directory and its still giving the same error
you dont remove the directory, you uninstall the package
it won't let me.. tells me to run apt-get -f install
ok run that apt-get -f install
and I will look at what else you can do
I did.. same error as the dist-upgrade
ok, what if you just do apt-get install  libofx0c102
if I do that, it wants the -f install again
thats rough, you're in dependancy hell, but theres always a way out
and without a browser, I'm lost.. haha
hang on a bit
I have little other options.. hehe..
any luck yet?
